name: Control Settings
tip: AAAAAA==

name: Gamepad Cursor Mode
tip:
You can control the cursor with the <color=#FF423F>Keyboard and Gamepad</color>.
Cursor Controls for Keyboard:
<color=#FF423F>Arrow Keys</color> <size=40><keySn>423</keySn><keySn>424</keySn><keySn>425</keySn><keySn>426</keySn></size>: Move Cursor
<color=#FF423F>Space Bar</color> <size=40><keySn>1201</keySn></size>: Confirm
<color=#FF423F>Ctrl Key</color> <size=40><keySn>422</keySn></size>: Reset Cursor
When the cursor is within a scrollable area
<color=#FF423F>Page Up and Down Keys</color> <size=46><keySn>421</keySn><keySn>420</keySn></size>: Scroll
gamepadtip:
You can control the cursor with the <color=#FF423F>Keyboard and Gamepad</color>.
<color=#FF423F>Left Stick</color><size=36><keySn>2001</keySn></size>: Movement
<color=#FF423F>Confirm Button</color><size=36><keySn>1001</keySn></size>: Confirm
<color=#FF423F>10 Keys</color><size=36><keySn>1013</keySn><keySn>1014</keySn><keySn>1015</keySn><keySn>1016</keySn></size>: Jump to nearby buttons
Press the <color=#FF423F>Left Stick</color><size=36><keySn>1005</keySn></size>: Reset
while cursor is within range
<color=#FF423F>Confirm Button</color><size=36><keySn>1001</keySn></size>,
<color=#FF423F>Left Stick</color><size=36><keySn>2001</keySn></size>: Scroll

name: Camera Mode
tip:
Two camera modes are available for mouse and keyboard.
Classic: Left-click on the mouse and drag to move the camera.
RPG: Camera moves with the mouse. Press [ALT] to click to move the camera.

name: Mobile Camera Sensitivity
tip: Adjusts camera sensitivity on your phone.

name: Mobile Zoom Sensitivity
tip: Adjusts sensitivity for pinch to zoom and other zoom functions on your phone.

name: Gamepad Camera Sensitivity
tip: Adjusts camera sensitivity on your gamepad.

name: Gamepad Zoom Sensitivity
tip: Adjusts zoom sensitivity on your gamepad.

name: Classic Camera Sensitivity
tip: Adjusts camera sensitivity when using a mouse and keyboard on classic mode.

name: Classic Camera Zoom Sensitivity
tip: Adjusts zoom sensitivity when using a mouse and keyboard on classic mode.

name: RPG Mode Camera Sensitivity
tip: Adjusts camera sensitivity when using a mouse and keyboard in RPG mode.

name: RPG Mode Camera Zoom Sensitivity
tip: Adjusts zoom sensitivity when using a mouse and keyboard in RPG mode.

name: Auto-Adjust Camera
tip: Sets the camera and angle to automatically adjust to keep your character in clear view.

name: Vibration
tip: Enables gamepad vibration.

name: Camera Inversion
tip: Reverses how your camera rotates vertically and horizontally.

name: Cursor Speed
tip: Adjusts movement speed of cursor when using Gamepad Cursor Mode.

name: Mouse Right-Click Settings
tip: Allows you to right-click on the mouse to close the current screen and return to the main screen when enabled.

name: System Settings
tip: AAAAAA==

name: Block Friend Requests
tip: Allows you to reject friend requests from other players.

name: Show Chat on Main Screen
tip: Allows you to show the chat channel on the bottom left of the main screen.

name: Show Chat During Battles
tip: Allows you to show the chat channel on the bottom left of the battle screen.

name: Receive Chat Updates
tip: Keeps the most recent IMs displayed in the bottom-left corner of the main screen when enabled.

name: Display Subtitles
tip: Displays subtitles when playing story animations.

name: Pause Story in Background
tip: Automatically pauses the story when the game is in the background.

name: Battle Settings
tip: AAAAAA==

name: Change Personas in Auto-Battle
tip: Chooses suitable Persona from summonable Personas and swaps between them in auto-battle. If turned off, only skills from the Persona equipped when attacking will be used.

name: Highlights in Auto-Battle
tip: Activates suitable Highlights in auto-battle. If turned off, Highlights won't be used in auto-battle.

name: Support Phantom Thief Skills in Auto-Battle
tip: Activates suitable Support Phantom Thief skills in auto-battle. If turned off, these skills won't be used in auto-battle.

name: Auto-Select 1 More Target
tip: Auto-targets and activates a 1 MORE attack on suitable targets. When turned off, targets and attacks must be manually selected and activated.

name: Simplify Battle Results
tip: Allows you to simplify battle results during Palace exploration.

name: Skip Battle Animations
tip: Allows you to skip certain battle animations.

name: Play Support Phantom Thief Animations
tip: Allows you to skip Support Phantom Thief skill animations.

name: Play Highlight Animations
tip: Allows you to skip Highlight animations.

name: Voice Language
tip: Selects the language for voiced lines.

name: Volume Settings
tip: AAAAAA==

name: Master Volume
tip: Adjusts the volume for the overall game.

name: BGM
tip: Adjusts the volume for background music in-game.

name: Sound Effects
tip: Adjusts the volume for sound effects in-game.

name: Voice
tip: Adjusts the volume for voiced lines in-game.

name: Environment
tip: Adjust the volume for environmental sounds in-game.

name: Window Mode
tip:
Window: Shows in a window.
Fullscreen: Uses the full display.
Borderless: Similar to fullscreen but the cursor can move off-screen.

name: Screen Resolution
tip: Increases resolution to improve overall graphic quality. Depending on your system, your frame rate may be lower than expected.

name: Dynamic Resolution
tip: Automatically optimizes the resolution for your system. This may cause your screen resolution to be lower than expected.

name: Frame Rate
tip: Selects the game's frame rate (FPS). The game will appear smoother at a higher FPS. Depending on your system and other settings, your frame rate may be lower than expected.

name: Render Quality
tip: Selects the overall render quality. Depending on your system, increasing the quality may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Shadow Quality
tip: Selects the shadow quality. Depending on your system, increasing the quality may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Effects Quality
tip: Selects effect quality. Depending on your system, increasing the quality may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Texture Quality
tip: Selects texture quality. Depending on your system, increasing the quality may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Level of Detail
tip: Selects graphic quality for distant objects. Depending on your system, increasing the quality may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Anti-Aliasing
tip: Allows you to make images smoother. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Render Scale
tip: Changes the proportion of your resolution to display. Increasing render scale improves graphics settings. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Post-Processing Effects
tip: Selects the quality of visual effects and overall graphics. Depending on your system, increasing the quality may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Party Following
tip: Shows party members following behind you when exploring the Metaverse. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Lens Flare
tip: Shows lens flares and enhances lighting. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Ambient Lighting
tip: Enhances shading in the game. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Reflections
tip: Enhances reflections in water and mirrors. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Bloom Effects
tip: Enhances light diffusion. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Fog Effects
tip: Enhances depth by blurring distant objects. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Volumetric Lighting
tip: Enhances rays of light. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Terrain Blending
tip: Blends terrain for smooth transitions between natural textures.

name: Sunlight Effects
tip: Enhances sunlight. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: VSync
tip: Maintains graphics quality in fast-paced scenes by adjusting to display capabilities. Depending on your system, this may cause your frame rate to be lower than expected.

name: Display
tip: Selects a display to use when multiple displays are available.

name: AAAAAA==
tip: Automatically adjusts resolution and frame rate with FidelityFX Super Resolution (FSR) if supported by your system.

name: AAAAAA==
tip: Improves graphic quality by enhancing color brightness and contrast if your system supports HDR.
